alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 9:23PM EDT until May 26 at 9:42PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Hazleton. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... White River at Edwardsport. White River at Petersburg. .Recent Rainfall across central Indiana has resulted in minor flooding along the white river. Additional Rainfall could produce higher crests. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...Until late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.5 feet, Flooding closes Old Vincennes Road. High water crosses SR 358 on the Daviess County side just west of the levee. Flooding begins to affect higher bottomlands. Residential property of river cabins begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM EDT Saturday /6:00 AM CDT Saturday/ the stage was 16.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 AM EDT Saturday /6:00 AM CDT Saturday/ was 16.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall to 15.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then rise to 16.4 feet Monday morning. It will fall to 16.4 feetMonday evening. It will then rise to 16.8 feet Tuesday evening. It will fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
